title: Pterosaur
author: Pterosaur
content: Bear market is here but new NFT/Metaverse projects are raising millions of funds, I think this is not bad news for the future of crypto and the next bull market might even be bigger than what we've seen before, what do you think? Are you excited for the future of crypto.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: Pterosaur on August 05, 2022, 12:16:15 PMBear market is here but new NFT/Metaverse projects are raising millions of funds,What are those projects that have raised millions despite that there's a little confidence these days for the NFT projects?Quote from: Pterosaur on August 05, 2022, 12:16:15 PMI think this is not bad news for the future of crypto and the next bull market might even be bigger than what we've seen before, what do you think? Are you excited for the future of crypto. If this is for real, it's not really a bad news as these projects have been gathering millions despite that the interest is little today. The next bull run will surely be bigger than the last time and that's why we're all waiting for it.But, not yet the time to see it. Maybe we need to wait for a year or two.

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: There are projects that receive initial investment from funds. Funds are gearing up for another bull run.I prefer to invest in platforms for NFT projects because it is safer. But I'm still waiting for the price to drop because the bottom can't last that short.

comments.author: Outhue
comments.body: Millions are always raised every year this isn't new, also it doesn't mean that 10k per Bitcoin is impossible, these new projects that raised higher funds are just another day another time opportunity to make money if you are smart, they are just preparing for the next bull season.

comments.body: Bunch of new projects can still raise a lot of money especially some projects that cooperated with the centralized exchange site. https://icodrops.com/You must also aware that if during the bear market as long as investors are getting hyped and they will always invest in a project. Basically that's a fundraising and the investors can also invest small amounts of money but the quantitiy become so much that makes the project able to raised millions of money from the market easily. that proves that if the intention to invest in the project is hardly getting affected by the market trend.

You should not listen to the fud but you also need to do your own homework, learn the foundation of the project, their goals and plans.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: Pterosaur on August 05, 2022, 12:16:15 PMBear market is here but new NFT/Metaverse projects are raising millions of funds, I think this is not bad news for the future of crypto and the next bull market might even be bigger than what we've seen before, what do you think? Are you excited for the future of crypto. How many of thoseÂ  projects will survive until the next bull run? How much of that money is going to be stolen by developers that just wanted to scam people out of their money? How many people will never see that money again? Those are way more important questions than the fact that some projects are still raising millions of dollars on investments, so while some may think that it is a good thing that those projects are still getting some funding I do not think that is something good at all.

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: Im still participating in several funding for some new projects but i can't even understand why there are some people who underestimate the crypto investors like said crypto investors are not going to invest in the new project caused by they feel worry with the market. that's not true. This time legit investors are looking only for legit project and that makes investors became very very selective these days. it doesn't mean they are feeling worry about crypto trend but the bad trend must make investors to be cautious with their money.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: And I don't think there's something wrong with that. A lot of people in the industry are investors, after all, I don't think the market being bearish would affect their decision to invest in projects they deem to be interesting or would generate profit, projects would still develop properly regardless of the market after all. Additionally, a lot of the profits come from the initial release of the projects, so early investors can generate way more than they invested across multiple investments if done properly. So it's kind of like one win offsets the losses of the rest kind of thing.

comments.author: Farma
comments.body: Quote from: Pterosaur on August 05, 2022, 12:16:15 PMBear market is here but new NFT/Metaverse projects are raising millions of funds, I think this is not bad news for the future of crypto and the next bull market might even be bigger than what we've seen before, what do you think? Are you excited for the future of crypto. well, that's great news than the FUD circulating for dropping crypto. even, during a bear market, there are still many who see crypto as a profitable type of investment. In fact, I feel that when the price drops in a bear market, a lot of investors enter the crypto world looking for a viable investment. So, we see that even when there is a bear market, investors are still flocking to invest there.

comments.author: kaseygriffin
comments.body: The bear market is a way of testing if the previous hyped projects can survive, but I'm still skeptical about what the OP is saying about fundraising. The way the NFT/metaverse project has gone through doesn't leave too much of an impression with copied products and hype with different teams. I think the market is changing day by day and trends are going to kick in again to entice new investors.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: I've seen millions of dollars invested in NFT games last year but I don't know now. Maybe there are a few if it's worth the price. The strategy was they won't let players go in unless they buy an initial NFT and that is where the start of the fund being raised comes. Is it a good sign? No. It's pretty clear that unless the top cryptocurrencies are pumping there won't be one with altcoins. Or less. A good sign will be if they are using Bitcoin, Ethereum, and BNB as means of buying NFT or buying their tokens before they can exchange them for NFT.

Investing in new projects is not bad but for newbies it is not recommended, if you have the ability to do your own research and have abundant capital, accept risks, there is no reason why you should not invest in a new project. But for newbies, this should be limited because the risk is too high, you know the new project has no guarantee of success.
